showerReviews.reviewText: My last visit was about thirty seconds. I walked into the locker room, it was so wet it was a slipping hazard. Dirty grimy from the wet, who would want to change in that? My membership was already cancelled so no need to come back. This …

I mostly go to the East Greenbush, Bethlehem and Guilderland locations and they are clean, pools are nice, the classes are great, and people are friendly. I do wish they would make some updates to mainly the EG location. I overall love the Y

My husband and I love it here. The staff are always very kind and the building is very clean. We love using the pool and I regularly attend yoga and zumba here. Just make sure you check the schedule for the pool hours/open lanes since some lanes may be closed for swim lessons or aquatic workout classes.

This is a great Y. They have lots of different choices. Everything to basketball courts to personal training. Everything seems to be pretty clean. Robyn is constantly cleaning the women's locker room. She pays attention to great detail of …

showerReviews.reviewText: Great place to play indoors and to have a birthday party!! Fun, affordable, very clean, friendly and helpful staff, what more could you want?
I've brought my toddler here through class trips and work events for kids and it's always a wonderful time. It's a large, clean space and lots of fun. I highly suggest coming here.

We absolutely love visiting BOTS for toddler time. The space is always likely and clean. They cap the number of participants so it does not get too crowded, and have a great class package deal to keep things super affordable and flexible for families. Can’t recommend enough!

showerReviews.reviewText: Nice small community rec center with park, dog run, playground, tennis court and soccer field. Rec center and interior bathrooms were clean and well maintained. Exterior portable toilets were also clean and well maintained. Parking is plentiful for any size rig or RV. I had 3 bars of Verizon 4G LTE Roaming.

The update is beautiful and there's a lot more to the place now than there was prior to the renovation. My reason for it getting 4 stars instead of 5 is due to the locker rooms. They could really use a good cleaning aa well as the actual …

Nice clean pool. Staff very nice. . This facility is not really easy for handicapped disabled people. Disabled parking is a bit or a walk to enter building The women's locker room really hard for large people. Very hard to get dressed and …

My husband and I were traveling through the area on a recent ski trip and we stopped here just to shower. It was nice to get a hot shower after a day on the slopes, especially for only $2/person. We had to fill out a safety waiver and …

showerReviews.reviewText: The playground here is Visit. As a parent of a child with autism, this playground has a few sensory details, built in and is plenty big enough, and safe enough, for all of our children. They especially loved the zip line and the dollhouse elements. My only complaint is that there’s not a bathroom closer by.

Great family park that is all inclusive. Very modern playground equipment, picnic area, and extremely clean restroom facilities. Glad we found this park, which is somewhat tucked away off of Central Avenue.
Very nice playground for kids. Modern design, perfect condition. The restroom next to it. If planning to come early in the morning or after rain take a towel to remove dew from surface.

showerReviews.reviewText: … close by.   The trails were great for the whole family to enjoy.   The shower and bathroom facilities are well above average and are cleaned multiple times daily.   The beach is on the smallish side, and can get cramped on the …

Great location had a wonderful camping experience. The shower and restroom were close by. A pump to catch water to wash utensils was located near lot 28 as well. Ice is $2 a bag, and wood is $10 a bag. Nights get a bit chilly, but nothing a …
Shower buildings need work, some things don't work (hot water, no flow in showers) other than that, this place is beautiful. Friendly staff, nice lake, very inexpensive!
Conveniently located state park right off the highway. Plenty of spacing between sites. My only major complaint is the lack of hot water for showering. The water was frigid for every shower we took.

… with 4 small kids and accommodate other guests that came and went throughout the week. The playground and hiking trails were close by as were the showers and bathrooms. The cabins are in great shape and appear to be well taken care of. The …

… A few just didnt have locks. Wanted a great shower? Might want to look a little further as i felt like 10 second tom trying to press the water button repeatedly with one hand every 10seconds while also washing my whole body with the other. …

… the swim at your own risk areas. These areas are groomed. This last time a lot of weed growth and I got rash from it. The year before last I "went under water " and pink eye .  All this even with a shower after swimming. But that's nature

… Another item to keep in mind is the water is cold a lot of the time we had to drive around the campground away from our site just to try to find a lukewarm shower. Imagine taking a shower well you're at the beach rinsing your feet off …
Wonderful camping park. Bathrooms really clean, shower has warm water. Lake is beautiful and water is clear.  We had fun swimming with fishes nibbling on our toes.

… nice but my "neighbors" were very noisy and partied well into the night (at least 2am).  And that was during the week when the campground was very sparsely utilized.  But overall, really nice park and good bathroom/shower accommodations.

showerReviews.reviewText: Nice clean pool , family friendly and that staff was professional,, lots of kids and summer camp, they have big pool from 3 feet to 13 feet and there is a diving board at the deepest end

This is quality for a public pool. The pool and locker room were clean, there's a diving board,  staff are helpful,  and the pool had a deep end for swimming. There was no deep end swim test. I also didn't see anywhere for lap swimmers …

Our family picnic happens in this park every year so we get to use this pool as well. The pool here is always clean and rarely smells too strongly of chlorine. The inclusion of not only a separate kiddie pool that is under a foot deep along …

I love coming here with my kids. I especially love the fact that they have a pool just for kids 5 and under while the adults and bigger kids can go to the underground pool.  I come every year here. It's clean and a beautiful park and the staff is great there.

Was trout fishing here today and caught my first bass of the year. I thought it was only stocked with trout but learned something new today. Beautiful park and it also has a porta potty that's very clean.
